channel.title: substance on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist
channel.description: Recent content in substance on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist

item.title: unwritten words
item.description: i think i need to start documenting more things in this log… working on the second terrain and i realised i couldn’t really remember the exact workflow i used, just a couple notes on the polygon count that were actually misleading after digging into the old project files.

item.title: the late bird gets the shrimp
item.description: more lost time! hurray, hurrah! after loosing around a week due to my refusal to work without air conditioning, today was the first day i was back in full capacity. unfortunately, more poor weather has me returning to my studies, as well as a bit of logging and blogging rain, rain, go away; why can’t i think of another clich√©?

item.title: project woe
item.description: having issues projecting hires geometry on to low, once again lol i think I just need to add more edges. given the use case of this model, I’m leaving it as is.
